Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its high quality and versatility, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
